Oscar Ukonu (amụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe.
Ukonu malitere eserese fị ka ihe omume ntụrụndụ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ọ gụrụ ụlọ na Federal Polytechnic na Nekede
Ọ na-akụziri onwe ya, ma ọ malitere ịmepụta ihe osise pen ballpoint na 2014, na-achọpụta na ọ họọrọ pen karịa pensụl graphite
A kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka hyperrealism na Afrorealism Dị ka ya onwe ya si kwuo, ọ "na-enyocha njirimara ndị ojii na nganga mgbe niile na ụwa na-arịwanye elu, yana echiche ndị gbara Afrorealism gburugburu
Ihe osise nwere ike iwe ya izu isii, n'oge nke ọ ga-eji ihe dị ka pensụl iri n'ihi ịka nká  nke pen ahụ
Maka ọrụ dị otú ahụ, ọ ga-eji ihe dị ka foto iri abụọ o were nke isiokwu ahụ maka ntụzịaka
N'ihe dịka afọ 2021, ọ rere ihe osise pen ballpoint maka ihe ruru $600 maka otu.
N'afọ 2020, e debere Blue Boy n'ọkwa nke isii na asọmpi BIC Art Master nke Société Bic.
